metadata.title: Mulaku Bhaji- Popular South Indian Street Snack
metadata.description: Mulaku Bhaji or Banana Pepper fritters are popular snacks in South India. Popular street food in South India.

en: [00:00.000] Mulaku bhaji or banana pepper fritters are popular snacks in South India.
[00:05.200] These are popular street food and very easy to make.
[00:09.800] For this recipe, you will need banana peppers and oil for deep frying.
[00:14.800] For making the batter, take gram flour in a bowl.
[00:19.200] Add chili powder, ground cumin, asafoetida and salt.
[00:24.300] Add water little by little and make a thick batter.
[00:29.800] Heat oil in a frying pan over medium heat.
[00:34.500] Dip each banana pepper into the batter and coat evenly.
[00:39.800] Deep fry the peppers in hot oil till golden brown.
[00:45.000] Transfer the fried bhajis to a kitchen paper towel.
[00:49.800] Enjoy mulaku bhaji while it is still warm.
